notes: Grind the ingredients into a fine powder and mix together well. Add vegetable oil to make into a paste and form into an egg-shaped mass weighing about 70g. Wrap the mass in a 15cm square piece of sterile gauze and tie the open ends with thread. Rub the affected areas with the gauze three times daily. For lichenfied areas, pressure ma be applied. If the medicinal ball dries, add more oil. Store in an airtight container.
